Package it.polimi.ingsw.gameLogic.model.match.player.personalBoard.faithPath

Class FaithPath

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gameLogic.model.match.player.personalBoard.faithPath.FaithPath
Direct Known Subclasses:
MultiFaithPath, SingleFaithPath
public abstract class FaithPath extends Object
This abstract class implements the common FaithPath things.

  • Constructor Details

    • FaithPath

      public FaithPath​(ArrayList<Cell> faithPath, int faithMarker)
      This is the constructor of the abstract FaithPath. Shutdowns the application for a negative startingPos.
      Parameters:
      faithPath - is the list of the Cells
      faithMarker - is the starting point of the player on the path

  • Method Details

    • getPosition

      public int getPosition()
      Returns:
      player's marker position

    • getFaithPath

      public List<Cell> getFaithPath()
      Returns:
      the faith Path

    • addFaithPoints

      public boolean addFaithPoints​(int steps, Communicator communicator) throws LastRoundException
      This method adds "steps" points, one by one. For every cell passed, it checks for a vatican report: if a report is effectively called, it collapses vaticanReportCell to Cell.
      Parameters:
      steps - is the number of steps to do
      communicator - is the interface with all the usable methods
      Returns:
      true
      Throws:
      LastRoundException - if a player ends the path journey

    • setPopeTile

      public boolean setPopeTile​(int section, int value)
      This method allows to change the state of each pope tile.
      Parameters:
      section - indicates, simultaneously, the report section and the tile to turn.
      value - is the turn value
      Returns:
      true

    • getPopeTiles

      public List<Integer> getPopeTiles()
      Returns:
      the tiles list

    • cellCollapse

      public boolean cellCollapse​(int pos)
      This method casts the VaticanReportCell at position "pos" to a normal Cell, in order to 'disable' the Report procedure for the next players who pass.
      Parameters:
      pos - is the position of the cell that has to be casted.
      Returns:
      true

    • externalVaticanReport

      public boolean externalVaticanReport​(int section)
      This method is called when a player steps onto a VaticanReportCell. It checks if the current player is in the same report section of the report Cell or before and turns the relative pope tile upside or downside.
      Parameters:
      section - the stepped report section
      Returns:
      true
      See Also:
      VaticanReportCell

    • getWinPoints

      public int getWinPoints()
      Counts and sums points coming from the player's path placement and all the upside pope tiles (=1), considering that the points that a tile offers are always two points more than its position in the Array (PopeTiles[0] gives 2 points, ...).
      Returns:
      the obtained points
